summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2812 for the improvement of North Half Of West Alaska Street, from Thirty-sixth Avenue Southwest to California Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by paving with brick or other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation, with armored concrete curbs; by constructing sewers and watermains, under Ordinance No. 33766, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
